title: LTDIM: IntelGraph DPA 2024.01 → 2025.02
body:
## Summary
- Blocked changes: 1; allowed changes: 3; manual review: 0
- Obligations:
  - Implement automated detection to support 24h breach notifications
  - Notify compliance team of retention change
  - Route data flows to EU sovereign storage providers
  - Schedule quarterly model governance audits
  - Stand up AI transparency reporting pipeline
  - Update retention timer configuration to 90 days
- SLO effects:
  - auditCycleTime: -10% (improved); drivers: Automated evidence collection via transparency tooling
  - dataResidencyCutover: 4hours (degraded); drivers: Migration to EU sovereign regions
  - onCallLoad: 2FTE (degraded); drivers: Need expanded on-call coverage for faster notification
  - storageCost: 15% (degraded); drivers: Longer retention window
  - transferLatency: 12% (degraded); drivers: Geo-fencing and compliance routing

## Policy Changes
- ai.governance.transparency (add, allowed) — Enable AI transparency controls and audit logging. [rule ai-transparency-governance]
- data.retention.window (update, allowed) — Extend retention window to 90 days. [rule retention-window-extension]
  - Before: retention.days = 30
  - After: retention.days = 90
- geo.transfer.restrictions (update, blocked) — Enforce EU-only residency for personal data transfers. [rule cross-border-eu-only]
  - Before: geoPolicy.allowNonEuTransfers = true
  - After: geoPolicy.allowNonEuTransfers = false
- incident.response.notification (update, allowed) — Accelerate breach notification SLA to 24 hours. [rule incident-accelerated-notification]
  - Before: incident.slaHours = 72
  - After: incident.slaHours = 24

diffs.summary: Enable AI transparency controls and audit logging.
Enforce EU-only residency for personal data transfers.
Accelerate breach notification SLA to 24 hours.
